label: Simón, Edith & Bernard Mottequin.  2018. Extreme reduction of morphological characters: a type of brachidial  development found in several Late Cretaceous and Recent brachiopod  species—new relationships between taxa previously listed as incertae sedis. Zootaxa 4444(1): 1–24.
